5.caption_en:
A teal presentation slide titled "Introduction to Ecosystem Thinking" labeled "01". The slide lists three guiding questions about why ecosystem thinking matters, the major trends driving ecosystem-based business models, and the three levels of ecosystem thinking to unlock long-term business growth.
